title: CII chairman asks Ulema to denounce lynching incidents in Friday sermons
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 17 (APP): Council of Islamic Ideology (CII) Chairman Dr Qibla Ayaz Thursday urged the Ulema and Mashaikh to denounce the lynching incidents of Khanewal and Faisalabad in their Friday sermons.
Dr Ayaz, in a statement, said taking law in oneâ€™s hand was against the spirit of Shariah and the Constitution.
The religious scholars should highlight the true teachings of Islam that insisted on tolerance and co-existence, he added.
